Dgame.Graphics.Image



class Image: Dgame.Graphics.Texture.Texture;
Image is the class for loading and manipulating images. It extends Texture of the feature to load images by filename and save the (current) image into a file.

Author:
rschuett

CTor

final this(ref const Texture tex);
CTor

final this(ref Surface srfc, Texture.Format t_fmt = Texture.Format.None);

final this(string filename);
CTor

final void loadFromFile(string filename, ref const Color colorkey);
Load the image from filename with a colorkey.

final void loadFromFile(string filename, const Color colorkey);
Rvalue version

final void loadFromFile(string filename);
Load the image from filename.

final void saveToFile(string filename);
Save the (current) image into filename.

alias subImage = Dgame.Graphics.Texture.Texture.subTexture;
Alias for subTexture.

final void copy(ref const Surface img, ShortRect* rect = null);
Copy the pixel data of a Surface to this Image. The second parameter is a pointer to the destination rect. Is it is null this means the whole img is copied.
